item.title: Pyenv is Awesome!
item.description: I think everyone who has touched python at some point has seen this picture… It’s mainly poking fun at the kinds of ways you can get your installation all screwed up if you’re not careful but is often misinterpreted as throwing shade on how python works. Brett Cannon’s Blog Post has an excellent deconstruction of what this xkcd means and how to avoid it. There’s lots you can do to avoid this happening to you.

item.title: Buggy Accelerate Backend
